content: **note ** several ravellers have found errata and made clarifying notes about this pattern please see comments and check project pages before starting *** this pattern is available in the antique pattern library corticelli 05 lessons in crochet - the first pdf pages 12 and 13 link to pdf http //www antiquepatternlibrary org/pub/pdf/corticelli5-1of2 pdf for printing purposes use pages 15 - 16 originally published in corticelli lessons in crochet book no 5 *c *1917 this design was featured on annie s attic free pattern of the day on july 16 2006 and july 16 2007 there are no archives retained for those one-day only patterns at annie s attic
